entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
